pullRequest.title: Support bitmap_intersect
pullRequest.bodyText:
Support aggregate function Bitmap Intersect, it is mainly used to take intersection of grouped data.
The function 'bitmap_intersect(expr)' calculates the intersection of bitmap columns and returns a bitmap object.
The defination is following:
FunctionName: bitmap_intersect,
InputType: bitmap,
OutputType: bitmap
The scenario is as follows:
Query which users satisfy the three tags a, b, and c at the same time.
select bitmap_to_string(bitmap_intersect(user_id)) from
(
    select bitmap_union(user_id) user_id from bitmap_intersect_test
    where tag in ('a', 'b', 'c')
    group by tag
) a

Closed #3552.
Change-Id: I0d50c9bb6827f7319c4d854f621412343a3ece24

commit.message:
Support bitmap_intersect

Support aggregate function Bitmap Intersect, it is mainly used to take intersection of grouped data.
The function 'bitmap_intersect(expr)' calculates the intersection of bitmap columns and returns a bitmap object.
The defination is following:
FunctionName: bitmap_intersect,
InputType: bitmap,
OutputType: bitmap

The scenario is as follows:
Query which users satisfy the three tags a, b, and c at the same time.

```
select bitmap_to_string(bitmap_intersect(user_id)) from
(
    select bitmap_union(user_id) user_id from bitmap_intersect_test
    where tag in ('a', 'b', 'c')
    group by tag
) a
```
Closed #3552.

Change-Id: I0d50c9bb6827f7319c4d854f621412343a3ece24

nodes.bodyText:
I think is_null is diffrent from empty bitmap.
why here return an empty bitmap?
why delete the src_bitmap here? who will manage the bitmap lifetime?
It seems that when src.len == 0, the src.ptr point to the bitmap value pointer, but when src.len != 0, the ptr points to the serialized bitmap contents, why?
I think null means "no data". And for "no data", return an empty set is reasonable.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    BITMAP = 2// more than one elements
          
          
            
                    BITMAP = 2 // more than one elements

You can't change this name directly.
Because it will cause query fail when grayscale upgrade

nodes.bodyText: Would better add a UNLIKELY macros.
should add this file to sidebar to make it visible.
why initial result bitmap as null? it seems that it will return empty bitmap when result bitmap is null

这个init函数是通用的，将来不止bitmap_intersect 会用到。
当前 bitmap_init 的实现是not nullable的，所以你这个函数合理的命名应该是nullable_bitmap_init， 或者bitmap_nullable_init.
